pageContext.claim: “They've literally been killing -- as you noticed, GDP was just announced, and shockingly to a lot of people, despite the hurricanes -- which possibly could be considered to be 1 point, we were 3. And we were at 3.2 last quarter, but we were at 3. And to be at 3 with a 1 point, that would have meant we would have hit 4 or thereabouts. And those are numbers that have not been seen for many years.”
pageContext.analysis: This is wrong. Quarterly GDP growth topped 3 percent often in Barack Obama's presidency, mostly recently 2015. Trump has pledged 4 percent annual growth, which most economists think is unlikely.
